div.head: For making wood green
div.ab: One needs to take one quart of white vinegar & one ounce of green & one ounce of glass alum, all mixed together, and you will put your substances into a leaded pot over the fire without taking air, & then put the pot in a dung heap for fifteen days, and once it is out, you will boil your substances for the space of three hours.

div.head: For making wood red
div.ab: Take one quart of old urine and three ounces of madder & one ounce of glass alum, and you will put all in your pot, & do as with green.

div.head: For making it blue
div.ab: Take one quart of urine as above and one ounce of alum & two drams of sal ammoniac & half an ounce of pastel woad flowers, the whole made into powder, and do as with green.

div.head: For making it violet
div.ab: Take one quart of urine & one ounce of alum & two drams of sal ammoniac & one of lake, & do as above.

div.head: For making it yellow
div.ab: Take urine as above and two ounces of guesdre woad & one ounce of fustet and two ounces drams of sal ammoniac, & do as above.
